001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
006
007import com.commercetools.api.models.Versioned;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.category.Category;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.category.CategoryDraft;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.category.CategoryDraftBuilder;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.category.CategoryUpdate;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.category.CategoryUpdateAction;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.category.CategoryUpdateActionBuilder;
014
015public interface ByProjectKeyCategoriesRequestBuilderMixin {
016    public ByProjectKeyCategoriesByIDRequestBuilder withId(String ID);
017
018    public ByProjectKeyCategoriesPost post(CategoryDraft categoryDraft);
019
020    public default ByProjectKeyCategoriesByIDPost update(Versioned<Category> category,
021            List<CategoryUpdateAction> actions) {
022        return withId(category.getId())
023                .post(builder -> CategoryUpdate.builder().version(category.getVersion()).actions(actions));
024    }
025
026    public default ByProjectKeyCategoriesByIDPost update(Versioned<Category> category,
027            UnaryOperator<UpdateActionBuilder<CategoryUpdateAction, CategoryUpdateActionBuilder>> op) {
028        return withId(category.getId()).post(builder -> CategoryUpdate.builder()
029                .version(category.getVersion())
030                .actions(op.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(() -> CategoryUpdateActionBuilder.of())).actions));
031    }
032
033    public default WithUpdateActionBuilder<CategoryUpdateAction, CategoryUpdateActionBuilder, ByProjectKeyCategoriesByIDPost> update(
034            Versioned<Category> category) {
035        return builder -> withId(category.getId()).post(b -> CategoryUpdate.builder()
036                .version(category.getVersion())
037                .actions(builder.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(CategoryUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
038    }
039
040    public default ByProjectKeyCategoriesByIDDelete delete(Versioned<Category> category) {
041        return withId(category.getId()).delete().withVersion(category.getVersion());
042    }
043
044    public default ByProjectKeyCategoriesPost create(CategoryDraft categoryDraft) {
045        return post(categoryDraft);
046    }
047
048    public default ByProjectKeyCategoriesPost create(UnaryOperator<CategoryDraftBuilder> op) {
049        return post(op.apply(CategoryDraftBuilder.of()).build());
050    }
051}
